name: Cigar Tours
description:
In 1971, the Rodriguez family found a new beginning on the beautiful island of Key West and established the Rodriguez Cigar Factory. Founded in 1984, we stand as the oldest operating cigar manufacturer in the Florida Keys. Rodriguez Cigars are exclusively constructed with vintage leaves that have been cured, aged and constructed through the traditional Cuban manufacturing process. Take a step back in time and experience an old world family tradition that began in Cuba in 1947. Learn the traditional way of rolling a cigar with the Oldest Cigar company in the Florida Keys, on the Rodriguez Cigar Rolling Tour. Rodriguez Cigar master cigar rollers will guide and instruct the full process of manufacturing cigars from start to finish.

Call 786-862-6303 or email concierge@oceansedgekeywest.com to book now.
